dc-workflow.title: P and B Application Process 2022
dc-workflow.description: use for the Personnel and Budget process

state.title: Unsatisfactory by Dept
state.description: Reappointment/Promotion Unsatisfactory by Dept, Member can submit appeal directly to the College-wide P&B.

state.title: Working Draft
state.description: Faculty MUST submit to chair when done editing

transition.title: Department Chair send to College P and B
Open For College Voting
transition.action: Send to College P&B for Voting

transition.title: Department Chair send to Department P and B
Open For Dept Voting
transition.action: Send to Department P&B for Voting

transition.title: Return to Faculty
transition.description: Send the Document Back to Draft State

transition.title: Submit Appeal to College P and B
transition.action: Submit Appeal to College P and B

variable.description: The ID of the user who performed the last transition
When the previous transition was performed
